author: BBC Sport
description: Atletico Madrid star Antoine Griezmann says a transfer to Manchester United is 'possible', adding there is a 'six out of 10' chance.
title: Antoine Griezmann says his chances of a Manchester United move are '6/10'

author: talkSPORT
description: Atletico Madrid striker Antoine Griezmann has said there is a 'six out of 10' chance of him joining Manchester United this summer. The France international has been consistently linked with a move to Old Trafford in recent months and it now seems there could be some substance to the speculation. Griezmann, 26, made the admission as a guest on the French TV programme Quotidien. Asked about the plausibility of a move to United, Griezmann agreed it was "possible". When pressed further and asked the probability on a scale of one to 10, Griezmann said: "Six."
title: Manchester United FC news: Antoine Griezmann claims there is 'six out of 10' chance of Old Trafford move

author: George Pitts
description: Romelu Lukaku is not a big-game player and Jose Mourinho should concentrate on bringing Gareth Bale or Antoine Griezmann to Manchester United, according to Phil Neville. The Belgian striker scored in Everton’s final-day defeat at Arsenal, finishing the season on 25 Premier League goals, four behind golden boot winner Harry Kane.
title: Phil Neville tells talkSPORT: Romelu Lukaku is NOT a big-game player...Manchester United should try to sign Gareth Bale or Antoine Griezmann instead

author: FourFourTwo
description: Alexandre Lacazette is said to have agreed to join Atletico Madrid and he has now revealed Antoine Griezmann's part in the discussions.
title: Griezmann behind Atletico Madrid move, says Lacazette

author: FourFourTwo
description: Antoine Griezmann has dropped a strong hint that he could agree to join Manchester United from Atletico Madrid in the next two weeks.
title: Atletico star Griezmann rates Manchester United move as six out of 10 chance

description: Der französische Stürmerstar Antoine Griezmann vom spanischen Topverein Atlético Madrid liebäugelt mit einem Wechsel zum Premier-League-Club Manchester United.
title: Fußball: Griezmann: Wechsel zu Manchester United möglich
